description.en:
Heejae, always down on his luck, finds himself kicked out of his apartment, fired from his part-time job, and dumped by his lover. In order to flee from his misfortune, Heejae decides to go on a package vacation deal for a fresh new start. After arriving in Paris, he waits for his partner for three hours. In the end, he thinks that this person is not going to show up. Seonwoo, a college classmate of Heejae’s, barges into his hotel room to tell him about the rumors he heard about Yoojae, Heejae’s ex. To be honest, Heejae and Seonwoo were classmates all through middle and high school, and in fact, Seonwoo confessed to Heejae when they reached high school. They grew apart when Heejae rejected Seonwoo. When Heejae is reunited with the big hearted Seonwoo, the past is brought up, and Heejae finds himself slipping off Seonwoo’s pants to suck his cock...

---
- **Note:** 
Part of Bomtoon [<Travel Short Stories Vacation Sex>](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1460940784107065347) and the 1st Story (Ch.0-4) on [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/vacationsex)
description.ko:
항상 운이 지지리도 없는 희재는 갑작스럽게 자취방에서 쫓겨나고 알바도 잘리고 사귀던 애인에게도 차이고 만다.
급기야 희재는 불행을 피하기 위해 새로 시작하는 기분으로 패키지 여행을 떠나기로 결심한다.
파리에 도착 후, 3시간을 기다려도 오지 않는 파트너에 절망하며 되는 일이 없다 생각하는 찰나
우연히 만난 대학 동기 선우는 희재를 차버린 애인 유재 선배에 대한 소문을 들려주겠다며 희재의 호텔방까지 쳐들어온다.
사실 희재와 선우는 중고등학교 동창으로 고등학교 때 선우가 희재에게 고백을 하고,<br>희재가 거절하면서 사이가 멀어진 것. 큰맘 먹고 온 파리에서 마주친 선우가 그때 일을 다시
꺼내자 희재는 홧김에 선우의 바지를 내리고 대뜸 그의 성기를 핥기 시작하는데...

---
- **Note:** 
Part of Bomtoon [<Travel Short Stories Vacation Sex>](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1460940784107065347) and the 1st Story (Ch.0-4) on [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/vacationsex)
